010package imagingbook.common.histogram;
011
012import ij.ImagePlus;
013import ij.gui.NewImage;
014import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
015
016/**
017 * Defines a simple image window to display histograms. This is a sub-class of
018 * {@link ImagePlus} (similar to {@code ij.gui.HistogramPlot}).
019 * 
020 * @author WB
021 * @version 2022/09/22 revised to extend ImagePlus
022 */
023public class HistogramPlot extends ImagePlus {
024        
025        static final int BACKGROUND = NewImage.FILL_WHITE;
026
027    private final int width =  256;
028    private final int height = 128;
029    private final int base = height - 1;
030    private final int paintValue = 0;
031        private final int[] H = new int[256];
032        
033        /**
034         * Constructor for a normalized discrete distribution.
035         * @param nH a normalized discrete distribution with values in [0,1]
036         * @param title the window title to be displayed 
037         */
038        public HistogramPlot(double[] nH, String title) {
039                setImage(NewImage.createByteImage(title, width, height, 1, BACKGROUND));
040                // nH must be a normalized histogram of length 256
041                for (int i = 0; i < nH.length; i++) {
042                        H[i] = (int) Math.round(height * nH[i]);
043                }
044                drawHist();
045        }
046        
047        /**
048         * Constructor for a discrete distribution.
049         * @param h a discrete distribution (histogram) with arbitrary values
050         * @param title the window title to be displayed 
051         */
052        public HistogramPlot(int[] h, String title) {
053                this(HistogramUtils.normalizeMax(h), title);
054        }
055        
056        /**
057         * Constructor for a piecewise linear cumulative distribution.
058         * @param cdf a piecewise linear cumulative distribution function
059         * @param title the window title to be displayed 
060         */
061        public HistogramPlot(PiecewiseLinearCdf cdf, String title) {
062                this(cdf.getCdf(), title);
063        }
064        
065        private void drawHist() {
066                ImageProcessor ip = this.getProcessor();
067                ip.setValue(0);
068                ip.drawLine(0, base, width - 1, base);
069                ip.setValue(paintValue);
070                int u = 0;
071                for (int i = 0; i < H.length; i++) {
072                        int k = H[i];
073                        if (k > 0) {
074                                ip.drawLine(u, base - 1, u, base - k);
075                        }
076                        u = u + 1;
077                }
078        }
079        
080}
